title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 111.3 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 111.3 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) This office
shall maintain in its records only such personal information which is relevant
and necessary to accomplish a purpose of this office which is required to be
accomplished by statute or executive order, or to implement a program
specifically authorized by law. (b) Personal information shall be collected, whenever practicable, directly from
the person to whom the information pertains. (c) This office seeks to ensure that all
records pertaining to or used with respect to data subjects are accurate, relevant, timely and complete. (d) These regulations provide information regarding the procedures by which data
subjects may assert rights granted by the Personal Privacy Protection

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
111.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
